name: Discrete Fishing
description:
A cool little game I made in less than a week for the BGMC 17 last year. The game will save a highscore so you can challenge your friends!

Controls:
Space - to cast your line
Left and right arrows - to steer hook
Enter - to dismiss score

Objective:
Avoid rubbish and seaweed, try sink as low as possible, on the way back up catch as many fish as possible. Hmm I wonder who that mysterious fisherman is...

If you have the software "Blender" installed you should be able to open up the game file if you are interested in how it works :)

Donations of any size are greatly appreciated but the game is otherwise free!
Enjoy!
